module: Module-level comment: The `check_RAM` module manages sequential data processing from the `RAM_autocorrelate_Rn` RAM module using a state machine. It initializes an index `j`, reads data from specified RAM addresses, and increments `j` until a termination condition (`j >= 12`) signals processing completion with `doneq`. The state machine controls transitions for setting addresses, fetching, and outputting data. This operation synchronizes with a clock (`clk`) and can be reset (`rst`).
